AppDesc.message: Screen Recorder is a software that allows you to capture and record your computer screen right in the browser!

Instruction.message: Please click "Capture Screen" button below to start capture your screen, when you done click "Stop Capturing"

RecordAudio.message: To record your desktop audio, please check Audio options in the next dialog screen.

SaveToDrive.message: We support saving result file to Google Drive on our website.
